org.apache.hadoop.ant.condition

类 DfsBaseConditional

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • org.apache.hadoop.ant.DfsTask
          • org.apache.hadoop.ant.condition.DfsBaseConditional
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Cloneable, org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.condition.Condition
    直接已知子类:
    DfsExists, DfsIsDir, DfsZeroLen

    public abstract class DfsBaseConditional
extends DfsTask
implements org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.condition.Condition
    This wrapper around DfsTask implements the Ant >1.5 Condition interface for HDFS tests. So one can test conditions like this: <condition property="precond"> <and> <hadoop:exists file="fileA" /> <hadoop:exists file="fileB" /> <hadoop:sizezero file="fileB" /> </and> </condition> This will define the property precond if fileA exists and fileB has zero length.
